card_text: If you control a Link Monster: Send 1 "Tri-Brigade" card from your Deck or Extra Deck to the GY, then target 1 Effect Monster on the field; apply the following effect based on the type of card sent to the GY.$N●Monster: Change the targeted monster's ATK to 0 until the end of this turn.$N●Spell: Negate that monster's effects until the end of this turn.$N●Trap: Return that monster to the hand.$NYou can only activate 1 "Tri-Brigade Roar" per turn.
